author: npostiau
body:
This PR is backport of PR #20344 .

@gpasztor (SMP trigger convener, for information)

Updated paths and histograms used by the HLT SMP validation (I am validator for HLT SMP):

- Monitoring of Single Electron triggers.
- Update of the paths monitored for Single Photon.

Changes have been tested by producing DQM files.
title: Update smp validation paths (backport 9_2_X)
